metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8782 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
tif_luv.c in libtiff allows attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds writes) via a crafted TIFF image, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2015-8781.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1').
